## htsjdk.samtools.metrics.StringHeader
# INPUT_BAM=testdata/org/broadinstitute/dropseq/private/barnyard/digitalallelecounts/sampleassignment/genomicpool/10_donors_chr22.selected_sites.bam	INPUT_VCF=testdata/org/broadinstitute/dropseq/private/barnyard/digitalallelecounts/sampleassignment/genomicpool/10_donors_chr22.selected_sites.vcf.gz	SAMPLE_FILE=testdata/org/broadinstitute/dropseq/private/barnyard/digitalallelecounts/sampleassignment/genomicpool/10_donors_chr22.selected_sites.donorList.txt	MINIMUM_MAF=0.025	READ_MQ=10	MIN_BASE_QUALITY=10

## METRICS CLASS	org.broadinstitute.dropseqrna.priv.barnyard.digitalallelecounts.sampleassignment.genomicpool.FacsAnalysis$FACSMetrics
